intension: Design a gift certificate for a travel insurance company that offers a 30% discount for all kinds of travel.
globalcaption: The image features a map with various travel items scattered around it. There are several pairs of shoes, including a pair of boots, placed on the map. A hat is also present, positioned near the top left corner of the map. \n\nIn addition to the shoes and hat, there are multiple books scattered across the map, with some located near the bottom left corner and others near the top right corner. A pair of scissors can be seen in the middle of the map, and a clock is placed near the top right corner. A handbag is also visible, situated in the middle of the map.
keywords: agency, holiday, journey, service, tourism, travel, traveling, trip, vacation, tb, certificate, sale, discount, insurance, illustration, cartoon, blue
